#summary EVNT defs

= Introduction =

Event definitions as defined in the .m3 files. It contains something that looks like a matrix, though I am not sure what it is used for.


= Details =

{{{

// Size = 96 byte/ 0x60 byte
// Incomplete
struct EVNT
{
    /*0x00*/ Reference name;
    /*0x08*/ int16 unk1[4];
    /*0x10*/ float matrix[4][4];
    /*0x50*/ int32 unk2[4];
};

}}}
